long_desc.thetext:
EPUB unit test is failing, see http://ci.mylyn.org/job/mylyn-docs-trigger/82/
-- Error Log from JUnit -- Class: org.eclipse.mylyn.docs.epub.tests.api.TestOPSPublication Method: testPack Actual: null Expected: null Stack Trace: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Unknown XPath Fixed in http://git.eclipse.org/c/mylyn/org.eclipse.mylyn.docs.git/commit/?id=5b587ecc23778719e73b8730a1766aa20bfa33e6
Apparently there were some files left over from the previous version of EpubCheck.
Closing resolved issues in released product.
